reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have just returned from a weeks stay in the Phoenix. Very good location right on beach, rooms were cleaned every day to a good standard.
reviews.title: Good location, Rip off prices

reviews.text: Breakfast was better then expected. it was the same every day but there was quite a variety consisting of eggs, sausages, ham, cheese, fruit, yoghurt, cake, plenty of tea and coffee. Fruit juice was very watery though! I did manage to have a different breakfast everyday. The lady who served breakfast was a delight - very good at her job.
reviews.title: RIP OFF RIP OFF RIP OFF

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My one big complaint is about the prices. 5 euors PER DAY for the fridge. 7 euors PER DAY for aircon. 6 euros for 2 sunbeds on the grass. Add that over a week and you have spent quite a tidy sum. What made me cross was the fact that the fridge was plugged in all the time with a lock on it! where is the logic? they might just as well let you have the fridge for free.
reviews.title: Pity about the hotel rip off!

likes.disliked: — Being charged extras fore every possible service

reviews.text: I think the air-con is free in the summer months but that doesn't help when you go out of season.
reviews.title: Fairly good hotel

likes.disliked: — Had to pay for air conditioning even in boiling weather.

reviews.text: I would stay here again, but purely for the location.
reviews.title: Could Be Better

likes.disliked: — Being ripped off with the price of everything available at hotel - drinks, air con, fridge, etc.
